title: Portraits By An Artist Of Six (Now Four) Young Men
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Portraits By An Artist Of Six (Now Four) Young Men
posts.post_content:
No, this isn't a pornographic thread, but rather a six pack of T206 portraits for sale individually or in bunches.

#1 - Jack Knight - Piedmont 350 - PSA 4 - $58

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10456/knight-portrait[/IMG]

#2 - Harry Howell - Piedmont 350 - PSA 3 - $OLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10445/howell-por[/IMG]

#3 - Art Devlin - Sweet Cap 150 - BVG 3 - $39

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10094/devlin[/IMG]

#4 - Bill Hallman - Sweet Cap 350 - BVG 3 - $37

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10109/hallman[/IMG]

#5 - Phil Poland - Piedmont 350 - SGC 30 - $OLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10292/poland[/IMG]

#6 - Bob Bescher - Piedmont 350 - SGC 20 - $26

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10038/bescher-portrait[/IMG]

All prices include single card shipping.  Multiple cards will be shipped for less and you will save.  

Buy 2 - Save $2
Buy 3 - Save $4
Buy 4 - Save $6    (This means $154 for the whole remaining shebang, I think)


James Joyce approves of this listing and suggests partaking thereof.;)
Damn, I clicked on this thinking it was a pornographic thread!
